Container.Name: clarkson
Container.Overview: Clarkson(https://github.com/linuxserver/Clarkson) is a web-based dashboard application that gives you a neat and clean interface for logging your fuel fill-ups for all of your vehicles. The application has full multi-user support, as well as multiple vehicles per user. Whenever you fill-up your car or motorcycle, keep the receipt and record the data in Clarkson.

Config.Name: MYSQL_HOST
Config.Description: Points the backend to the MySQL database. This can be either a docker hostname or an IP.
